resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102896</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102896</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210033</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Motion in One Dimension - Grade 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung in einem Maß - Grad 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement dans une dimension - catégorie 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento em uma dimensão - classe 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento in una dimensione - grado 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνηση σε μια διάσταση - βαθμός 10</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento en una dimensión - grado 10</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Grade 10: Motion. The physics of motion in one dimension involves studying how things move in a straight line. This is useful for learning how to describe the movement of cars along a straight road or of trains along straight railway tracks.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">Africa</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grad 10: Bewegung. Die Physik der 
Bewegung in einem Maß bezieht mit ein, zu studieren, wie Sachen in 
eine gerade Geraden bewegen. Dieses ist für das Lernen 
nützlich, wie man die Bewegung der Autos entlang einer geraden 
Straße oder der Serien entlang geraden Bahnspuren beschreibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Catégorie 10 : Mouvement. La physique
du mouvement dans une dimension implique d'étudier comment les choses
se déplacent une ligne droite. C'est utile pour apprendre 
comment décrire le mouvement des voitures le long d'une route droite 
ou des trains le long des pistes ferroviaires droites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Classe 10: Movimento. A física do 
movimento em uma dimensão envolve estudar como as coisas se movem em 
uma linha reta. Isto é útil para aprender como descrever o 
movimento dos carros ao longo de uma estrada reta ou dos trens ao 
longo das trilhas railway retas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grado 10: Movimento. La fisica di 
movimento in una dimensione coinvolge studiare come le cose si muovono
in una linea retta. Ciò è utile per imparare come descrivere 
il movimento degli automobili lungo una strada diritta o dei treni 
lungo le strade ferrate diritte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαθμός 10: Κίνηση. Η φυσική της κίνησης σε
μια διάσταση περιλαμβάνει τη μελέτη πώς τα πράγματα κινούνται σε
μια ευθεία γραμμή. Αυτό είναι χρήσιμο για πώς να 
περιγράψει τη μετακίνηση των αυτοκινήτων κατά μήκος ενός ευθύ 
δρόμου ή των τραίνων κατά μήκος των ευθειών διαδρομών 
σιδηροδρόμων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Grado 10: Movimiento. La física del 
movimiento en una dimensión implica el estudiar de cómo las cosas se
mueven en una línea recta. Esto es útil para aprender cómo 
describir el movimiento de coches a lo largo de un camino recto o de 
trenes a lo largo de pistas ferroviarias rectas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210033</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">GNU Free Documentation License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102896</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/motion-in-one-dimension-grade-10</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
